title: wtf for dodging a que?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: boy it really sounds like riot wants people to rage and say things that people typically wouldn't say for 40mins, i dodged a game cause people were playing with bans and talking trash and i have to wait 30mins to play? i can't wait till you have a convention that players get to go to, i'm a big ass dude and i'm gonna find the occksucker who makes this bullshit for us to deal with and have a chat.

replies.body:
Hello dadimplayingrn, this is a result of multiple (2+) queue dodges in either ranked or aram. 
For more information on queue dodging view the [KB article on this.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)

> [{quoted}](name=I Only Kayle,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=T629EQc0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-28T00:02:44.117+0000)
>
> Hello dadimplayingrn, this is a result of multiple (2+) queue dodges in either ranked or aram. 
> For more information on queue dodging view the [KB article on this.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)



lol this is my first dodge dg you talk about
